channel.title: [317] Bronze Age Release V2.0
channel.description:
Welcome to the second release and final release of the Bronze Age series. The follow Introduction will explain why:
[b]Introduction: Welcome to the second and final release of Bronze-Age. I would like to state that I've broken the promise I wanted to keep; I have not learnt anything but the beginner's coding from this base. In that moment, I need a base in which I can exceed in programming. In which I've decided to move onto Project-Insanity and then move to Hyperion or something harder. After that has been done and I've exceeded in programming, I plan to move back to Bronze-Age 2.0 and then with the gained knowledge I shall re-do the entire server! To not take this as the Final release though its called that. This is only the beginning in my opinion.[/b]
The pictures are quite the same to be honest. I have NOT changed anything in the server as far as Teleports, and the home. I've worked on making the server more efficient since the last release and I've done quite a bit in that process moment. At this moment I'm deeply sorry for not changing the home at least I focused mostly on making a lot of methods cleaned up, and working on making the server like I said more efficient.
[b]Bronze Age V2.0 Server Features:[/b] [code]10/15/10 * TextHandler.Java has been cleaned.
10-16-10 * Added almost perfect Dharok Formula and Obby Neck * Re-done Cooking method * Re-done CalculateMaxHit method * Fixed GFX Projectile (Magic) * Fixed a Autospawn.cfg lag * Range Following Added (Some things need to be tweaked)
10-18-2010 * A lot of useless codes removed from Client.Java, and Potions.Java * Some timers have been fixed (Not perfect though, I tried)[/code]
[center][size=12pt][b]Media:[/b][/size][/center] The Home and Equipment: [IMG]http://i284.photobucket.com/albums/ll12/demonking7982/Starting-1.jpg[/img]
Lag-Walking has been fixed: [IMG]http://i284.photobucket.com/albums/ll12/demonking7982/Picture2-3-1.jpg[/img]
A lot of Doors have been fixed (Varrock, Lumbridge, and Falador): [IMG]http://i284.photobucket.com/albums/ll12/demonking7982/Picture3-2-1.jpg[/img]
Old Gameframe: [IMG]http://i284.photobucket.com/albums/ll12/demonking7982/Picture5-1.jpg[/img]
Little Quest: [IMG]http://i284.photobucket.com/albums/ll12/demonking7982/Picture6-1.jpg[/img]
The Shops will be changed next Version: [IMG]http://i284.photobucket.com/albums/ll12/demonking7982/Picture7-1.jpg[/img]
Running has been modified: [IMG]http://i284.photobucket.com/albums/ll12/demonking7982/Picture8-1.jpg[/img]
Spirit Tree added: [IMG]http://i284.photobucket.com/albums/ll12/demonking7982/Picture9-1.jpg[/img]
The biggest thing that I am sorry about are the Skillcapes. I was not able to add the Skillcapes due to the fact of the client being a complete developed client. Something was wrong with the models or something; and I have no idea what happened. In that case I could not have the Skillcapes added.
Please forgive me about this inconvenience as I did not plan on this as well. The one thing I'm going to keep is that I [b]WILL[/b] come back to Bronze-Age once I have exceeded in programming. I [b]WILL[/b] make this a better source than what DeltaScape base is taken for. Just wait everyone, once I am better in programming. I'll make this a better source!
Links: Uppit: http://uppit.com/5ghe9goj6xjk/Bronze_Age_Server.rar
Client: Mediafire: http://uppit.com/ltmynp55lo06/Bronze_Age_Client.rar
The server and client have been separated. I've re-uploaded the client due to some problem's people have had with Windows 7 or Vista. This re-uploaded version should of fixed those 100 errors in the Client.
[b]Credits[/b] _Delta Johnny J #Drake
Thank You for Reading,
Ix Soulcist xI (James)

I’d recommend this for starter coders, great source and client i used this when i first started coding servers. I rooted this up into a good server 40+ max people not going to advertise it though. So i just want people to know that this is the best starter source

item.title: [317] Bronze Age Release V2.0
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Programming a RSPS isn’t going to teach me a lot about Java in particular. At least that’s what I’ve heard… -.- I’m going to I guess read a lot of Tutorials about Java.

I was thinking about Hyperion, however, I don’t even think I have the knowledge for that at the moment. Deltascape is a great base to start off from, not something that I could continue in hopes to exceed in Java though.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Bronze Age Release V2.0
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I Vain I:

James; are you planning on continuing this series, or are you going to move to a bigger project?

If I found something to work off of that I would like to work off of. Then in the near future I plan on continuing Bronze Age and work from V2.0. At the moment, I suppose I need to start back and learn more about Java. Then again, I don’t know where to start from to be honest.

Read full topic
